106afb6647032200b4fad7527c9a71e7sys_hub_step_instanceArnoud.Kooi2018-05-04 15:10:43falseae35b072dbb11300d86f9444ca9619d611Generate Twitter Data3673b032dbb11300d86f9444ca96192cfalse3673b032dbb11300d86f9444ca96192csys_hub_step_instance_ae35b072dbb11300d86f9444ca9619d6admin2019-06-13 19:21:17sys_hub_step_instanceae35b072dbb11300d86f9444ca9619d6400sys_variable_valueArnoud.Kooi2019-05-23 23:02:4328c388624fe5b30035e0fdb28110c76a0Arnoud.Kooi2019-05-23 23:02:4335aa573fd7802200bdbaee5b5e610375f5e56d79b3101300176b051a16a8dce4sys_hub_step_instanceae35b072dbb11300d86f9444ca9619d6200sys_variable_valueArnoud.Kooi2018-05-04 15:10:442a35b072dbb11300d86f9444ca9619f94admin2019-06-13 18:52:48(function execute(inputs, outputs) { /* Example to post a tweet via IntegrationHub by Arnoud Kooi This script prepares a full url that is passed in the next REST step to actually tweet */ var tweet = inputs.tweet; var consumer_key = gs.getProperty('x_220561_twittertw.consumer_key'); var consumer_secret = gs.getProperty('x_220561_twittertw.consumer_secret'); var access_token = gs.getProperty('x_220561_twittertw.access_token'); var access_token_secret = gs.getProperty('x_220561_twittertw.access_token_secret'); //creates a unique random string (nonce) required by oauth var nonce = Math.random().toString(36).substring(2, 15) + Math.random().toString(36).substring(2, 15); //timestamp epoch (seconds sinds 1-1-970 GMT) var timeStamp = Math.round(new GlideDateTime().getNumericValue() / 1000); /* //below 2 lines to debug using the sample provided at: //developer.twitter.com/en/docs/basics/authentication/guides/creating-a-signature nonce = 'kYjzVBB8Y0ZFabxSWbWovY3uYSQ2pTgmZeNu2VS4cg'; // timeStamp = '1318622958'; */ //Generating following strings is part of the signature proces, that has to be //followed exactly, in order to be autohorized to tweet on behave of the account var autSign = //'include_entities=true&' + //uncomment for debugging twitter example 'oauth_consumer_key=' + percentEncode(consumer_key) + '&' + 'oauth_nonce=' + percentEncode(nonce) + '&' + 'oauth_signature_method=HMAC-SHA1&' + 'oauth_timestamp=' + timeStamp + '&' + 'oauth_token=' + percentEncode(access_token) + '&' + 'oauth_version=1.0&' + 'status=' + percentEncode(tweet); var baseString = "POST&" + percentEncode(inputs.endpoint) + "&" + percentEncode(autSign); var signingKey = percentEncode(consumer_secret) + "&" + percentEncode(access_token_secret); //Hashing and Base 64 encoding, using script CryptoJS library, saved in a Scriptinclude. var encrypted = x_220561_twittertw.CryptoJS.HmacSHA1(baseString, signingKey); var signature = x_220561_twittertw.CryptoJS.enc.Base64.stringify(encrypted) /* //ServiceNow IntegrationHub places double quotes around keys and values //Due to this you can't pass in the autorization header as //twitter needs double quotes around the values inside the header. //feel free to try to get it to work var hdrs = "OAuth oauth_consumer_key='" + inputs.consumer_key + "', " + "oauth_nonce='" + nonce + "', " + "oauth_signature='" + percentEncode(signature) + "', " + "oauth_signature_method='HMAC-SHA1', " + "oauth_timestamp='" + timeStamp + "', " + "oauth_token='" + inputs.access_token + "', " + "oauth_version='1.0'"; var hdrsDblQ = 'OAuth oauth_consumer_key="' + inputs.consumer_key + '", ' + 'oauth_nonce="' + nonce + '", ' + 'oauth_signature="' + percentEncode(signature) + '", ' + 'oauth_signature_method="HMAC-SHA1", ' + 'oauth_timestamp="' + timeStamp + '", ' + 'oauth_token="' + inputs.access_token + '", ' + 'oauth_version="1.0"'.replace(/"/g, '"'); */ var qs = '?oauth_consumer_key=' + consumer_key + '&' + 'oauth_nonce=' + nonce + '&' + 'oauth_signature=' + percentEncode(signature) + '&' + 'oauth_signature_method=HMAC-SHA1&' + 'oauth_timestamp=' + timeStamp + '&' + 'oauth_token=' + access_token + '&' + 'oauth_version=1.0&' + 'status=' + percentEncode(tweet);; outputs.endpointAndQuery = (inputs.endpoint + qs).toString(); //needs a cast as string /* //Following are used again to debug, when generating signature //add them to output variables if you want to use outputs.tweet = tweet; outputs.headers = hdrsDblQ; outputs.signingKey = signingKey; outputs.baseString = baseString; outputs.encrypted = encrypted; outputs.signature = signature; */ //Helper method to encode the string the proper way function percentEncode(inp) { var char, charCode, i; var encodedString = ''; for (i = 0; i < inp.length; i++) { char = inp.charAt(i); if ((char >= '0' && char <= '9') || (char >= 'A' && char <= 'Z') || (char >= 'a' && char <= 'z') || (char == '-') || (char == '.') || (char == '_') || (char == '~')) { encodedString += char; } else { charCode = inp.charCodeAt(i); encodedString += '%' + charCode.toString(16).toUpperCase(); } } return encodedString; }; })(inputs, outputs); 71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719bsys_hub_step_instanceae35b072dbb11300d86f9444ca9619d65sys_variable_valueArnoud.Kooi2018-05-04 15:30:2071b9bcf2dbb11300d86f9444ca9619fc0Arnoud.Kooi2018-05-04 15:30:20https://api.twitter.com/1.1/statuses/update.json39b9bcf2dbb11300d86f9444ca9619easys_hub_step_instanceae35b072dbb11300d86f9444ca9619d61sys_variable_valueadmin2019-06-13 18:52:4898f3db8d4f8233000d648020a310c7300admin2019-06-13 18:52:48https://api.twitter.com/1.1/statuses/update.json98f3db8d4f8233000d648020a310c716access_tokenae35b072dbb11300d86f9444ca9619d6Arnoud.Kooi2018-05-04 15:10:446a35b072dbb11300d86f9444ca9619fa0Arnoud.Kooi2018-05-04 15:10:44var__m_sys_hub_step_ext_input_ae35b072dbb11300d86f9444ca9619d6
